## waitForText() function

Wait for text to appear on the page.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function waitForText(page: Page, text: string, { timeout, extraMessage }?: WaitForTextOptions): Promise<ElementHandle>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | puppeteer page object. |
|  text | string | String to look for. |
|  { timeout, extraMessage } | [WaitForTextOptions](./pentf.waitfortextoptions.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;ElementHandle&gt;

A handle to the text node.
